author: andschwa
body:
Resolves #2422.

Sorry, I don't use VS Code much (can't take Emacs from me!). I've updated the default configuration to provide an absolute path, since the build script `cd`s into the directory of the `project.json` to build.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@andschwa**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution!

It looks like you're a Microsoft contributor (Andy Schwartzmeyer). If you're full-time, we DON'T require a Contribution License Agreement. If you are a vendor, please DO sign the electronic Contribution License Agreement. It will take 2 minutes and there's no faxing! https://cla.microsoft.com.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@andschwa thanks for fix! Please merge the PR.

The VS Code is recommended in docs. Is better anything?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @iSazonov it's the only thing that works for debugging, and a lot of people like it, I am just very strongly tied to Emacs myself 😄

title: Fix VS Code debug output
